          <title>
            <string language="en">Naming technique for various alkyl groups of benzene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benennen der Technik für verschiedene 
Alkylgruppen Benzol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nommer la technique pour différents groupes

grupos alkyl de benceno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the alkyl groups attached to benzene with their respective nomenclature.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les groupes alcoyle
